TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed XmlStreamStore extends System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore
Public NotInheritable Class XmlStreamStore Inherits AnnotationStore

Docs.summary: Represents an XML data store for writing and reading user annotations.
Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.IO.Stream stream) cil managed

Docs.param: The I/O stream for reading and writing user annotations.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified I/O .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `stream` 必须是有效的 XML 格式，而且符合[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_caf](~/includes/tlasharptla-caf-md.md)]架构。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.IO.Stream stream, class System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2<class System.Uri, class System.Collections.Generic.IList`1<class System.Uri>> knownNamespaces) cil managed

Docs.param: The I/O stream for reading and writing user annotations.
A dictionary with a list of known compatible namespaces.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified I/O and dictionary of known compatible namespaces.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 这<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.XmlStreamStore.%23ctor%2A>构造函数可注册应用程序特定的已知命名空间。
`knownNamespace`字典定义当批注的一部分存储自定义内容时使用的应用程序命名空间。 字典的键是已知的应用程序的主命名空间。 命名空间密钥是与较旧的命名空间中的"密钥"命名空间与兼容的值列表相关联。 批注从此列表中加载的所有命名空间时将替换为"密钥"命名空间。
`stream` 必须是有效的 XML 格式，而且符合[批注架构](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/annotations-schema.md)。

Docs.exception: The dictionary contains a duplicate namespace. -or- The dictionary contains an element that has a key.

Public Overrides Sub AddAnnotation (newAnnotation As Annotation)

Docs.param: The annotation to add to the store.
Docs.summary: Adds a new to the store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.XmlStreamStore.AddAnnotation%2A>调用时，<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation>进行检查以查看是否<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation>已被添加到应用商店。 如果<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation>已添加了，存储区中<xref:System.ArgumentException>则会引发错误。

Docs.exception: An with the same already is in the store.
An I/O has not been set for the store.
has been called on the store.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether data in annotation buffers is to be written immediately to the physical data store.
Docs.value: 如果对每次操作都要立即将批注缓冲区中的数据写入物理数据存储区，则为 ；如果要在应用程序显式调用 时写入批注缓冲区中的数据，则为 。

remarks.format:

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Collections.Generic.IList`1<class System.Uri> GetWellKnownCompatibleNamespaces(class System.Uri name) cil managed
Public Shared Function GetWellKnownCompatibleNamespaces (name As Uri) As IList(Of Uri)

Docs.param: The starting URI sequence to return the list of namespaces for.
Docs.summary: Returns a list of namespaces that are compatible as an input namespace.
Docs.returns: A list of compatible namespaces that match ; otherwise, if there are no compatible namespaces found.

remarks.format:
## Remarks `name`参数有效仅对于预定义[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_caf](~/includes/tlasharptla-caf-md.md)]命名空间。 中提供的任何其他命名空间`name`参数<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.XmlStreamStore.GetWellKnownCompatibleNamespaces%2A>将返回`null`，即使是那些命名空间注册通过`knownNamespaces`参数<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.XmlStreamStore.%23ctor%2A>构造函数。
命名空间由预定义[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_caf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-caf-md.md)]如下：
- http://schemas.microsoft.com/windows/annotations/2003/11/core
- http://schemas.microsoft.com/windows/annotations/2003/11/base
- http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IgnoredNamespaces As IList(Of Uri)
public: property System::Collections::Generic::IList<Uri ^> ^ IgnoredNamespaces { System::Collections::Generic::IList<Uri ^> ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets a list of the namespaces that were ignored when the XML stream was loaded.
Docs.value: 加载 XML 流时被忽略的命名空间的列表。

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.XmlStreamStore.IgnoredNamespaces%2A>属性将永远不会返回`null`，但返回的列表能为空，如果没有命名空间将被忽略。
<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.XmlStreamStore.IgnoredNamespaces%2A> 当程序中读取数据批注内容由不同版本创建的 XML 标记兼容性方面的帮助[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_caf](~/includes/tlasharptla-caf-md.md)]。 较旧的应用程序时提供创建使用的较新版本的批注内容[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_caf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-caf-md.md)]，<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.XmlStreamStore.IgnoredNamespaces%2A>返回的元素和属性对旧框架未知的 XML 命名空间列表。 批注内容是读取和反序列化旧应用程序时，将忽略未知的 XML 元素和属性与较新的命名空间关联。 有关详细信息请参阅*XML 标记兼容性规范*在[ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=73824 ](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=73824)。

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnStoreContentChanged(class System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.StoreContentChangedEventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub OnStoreContentChanged (e As StoreContentChangedEventArgs)
Public Shared ReadOnly Property WellKnownNamespaces As IList(Of Uri)
public: static property System::Collections::Generic::IList<Uri ^> ^ WellKnownNamespaces { System::Collections::Generic::IList<Uri ^> ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets a list of all namespaces that are predefined by the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_caf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-caf-md.md)].
Docs.value: 由预定义的命名空间的列表 [！INCLUDE[TLA#tla_caf](~/includes/tlasharptla-caf-md.md)]。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 命名空间由预定义[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_caf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-caf-md.md)]如下：
- http://schemas.microsoft.com/windows/annotations/2003/11/core
- http://schemas.microsoft.com/windows/annotations/2003/11/base
- http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation
